name: Instructor Conflict
description: An instructor cannot teach two courses at the same time_slot.

name: Room Capacity
description: No rooms can be assigned beyond their room_capacity.

name: Room Conflict
description: No rooms can be assigned to multiple courses at the same time_slot.

name: Room Type
description: Courses must be assigned according to their required room_type.

name: Instructor Availability
description: A course must be scheduled at a time_slot where its assigned instructor is available (based on their available_times data).

name: Room Availability
description: A course must be scheduled at a time_slot where the assigned room is available (based on its available_times data).

name: Instructor Daily Load
description: An instructor cannot be assigned more courses per day than their max_courses_per_day which is always 4.

name: Valid Room ID
description: Assigned room_id must be one of the valid room_id provided in the room data.

name: Intra-Semester Conflict
description: Courses assigned to the same academic semester must not overlap in time, regardless of student enrollment.
